title: Hour 2 - Eric Mangini, Russell Wilson
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Eric Mangini, Russell Wilson
description:
Veteran QBs still having a learning curve is one of the few topics that Colin touched on in hour two. Making it known that it isnt all Russell Wilson fault that the Broncos are struggling. Although "Pressing" the issue to justify his contract could be a partial problem. Eric Mangini joins the show to talk about the NFL, Russell Wilson and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
